mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(c.processid) FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_config_value a WHERE a.configid = 25 AND a.value = #{batchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT * FROM tb_config_value b WHERE b.configid = 7 AND b.value = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) c GROUP BY c.processid HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
mapper.delete: delete from tb_config_value where processid = #{processid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (moduleid != 1 OR configid != 2) AND (moduleid != 1 OR configid != 3) AND (moduleid != 1 OR configid != 8) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 10) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 11) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 14) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 15) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 16) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 17) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 24) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 27) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 32) AND (moduleid != 2 OR configid != 33)
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_config_value
id,
processid,
moduleid,
configid,
value,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{processid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{moduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{configid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tb_config_value
processid = #{processid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
moduleid = #{moduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
configid = #{configid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
